snippet: There were no injuries in the incident at Garden State Plaza mall, where the authorities said the suspect, Richard Shoop, 20, was found dead of a self-inflicted gunshot wound.
abstract: Man wearing black and carrying a rifle opens fire at a large northern New Jersey mall, prompting hundreds of customers to seek cover and an extensive search for the suspect; no customers or employees are injured in the episode at Garden State Plaza in Paramus but reports of shots fired prompted a lockdown and spread fear among the many people who were at the mall; authorities are sweeping mall for suspect.

byline.original: By EMMA G. FITZSIMMONS and PATRICK McGEEHAN

lead_paragraph: There were no injuries in the incident at Garden State Plaza mall, where the authorities said the suspect, Richard Shoop, 20, was found dead of a self-inflicted gunshot wound.

headline.main: Suspect Is Dead in New Jersey Mall Shooting
headline.print_headline: New Jersey Mall Locked Down After Gunfire
